overview: Parallel to being a founding partner at Monashees Capital, Fabio is the founding entrepreneur and owner of Rossignol do Brasil, a leading retailer specialized in functional clothing and equipment for winter and mountain sports. From 1986 to 1994, Fabio was a professional skier and participated in several high-level international ski tournaments, including 4 world championships and the Winter Olympic games of Albertville, France, in 1992. He is additionally a Board Member of Grupo Ultra since 1997. Fabio holds a B.A. in Hotel Management from Hosta University in Leysin, Switzerland.
